Title: Terminator: The Sarah Connor Chronicles
Actors: Lena Headey, Thomas Dekker, Summer Glau, Richard T. Jones
Plot: Set after the events in 'Terminator 2' Sarah Connor and her son John, trying to stay under-the-radar from the government as they plot to destroy the computer network Skynet in hopes of preventing Armageddon.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 16 nominations.
